select /*+ mdd_exmordt_l28$S01_일반검사관리 검사결과삭제 건의검사여부 */ /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-med-md-mdp-dao-MdpExmordtDAO-selectOneSgstExmnYn */ 1 as DLTN_YN from MDEXMORDT where PTNO = #{ptno} and ORDR_YMD = to_date(#{ordrYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD') and ORDR_SNO = to_number(#{ordrSno}) and nvl(HLSC_EXMN_YN, 'N') = 'Y'
